description:
Rylan was missing the straight-boy action!
"I love straight guys," he said. "It's great to be able to come here and hook up with 'em because it's not so easy in the real world!"
The last time I had seen Rylan was at the borrowed desert resort house — which was nearly a year ago.
He's been busy with work and school, but had a break and wanted to come out.
"I want to get fucked," he said. "It's been a while."
Of course, Dave was all grins. He's so easy going and it seems like he's up for anything.
So, he gave Rylan what he wanted. And Rylan even gave him a little some too!
title: Dave & Rylan
